meanings.definition: The study or science of wine and winemaking.
meanings.sent1: Learning about oinologies helps us understand how wine is made.
meanings.sent2: She decided to pursue oinologies to become a wine expert.
meanings.sent3: The oinologies class was so fun, we got to taste different wines!
meanings.sent4: Exploring oinologies is like unraveling the secrets of winemaking.
meanings.sent5: His passion for oinologies made him a connoisseur of fine wines.

meanings.definition: The practice or art of wine tasting and appreciation.
meanings.sent1: Attending wine tastings is a great way to experience oinologies.
meanings.sent2: She developed a refined palate through her oinologies practice.
meanings.sent3: Their oinologies session turned into a delightful evening of wine sampling.
meanings.sent4: In the world of oinologies, every sip tells a story.
meanings.sent5: Experiencing oinologies firsthand opened her eyes to the beauty of wine.
